summary: Michael Chen submitted an incomplete application for the Delaney Wings Scholarship. While he provided basic contact and school information, several items are missing. He is not currently a WAI member and did not provide complete school address information. His supporting documents are limited: 2 recommendation letters and no medical certificate or flight logbook.

score_breakdown.profile_information: 67 - Name and email present but no WAI membership number or middle name
score_breakdown.contact_information: 75 - Home address present but missing home phone number; only work phone provided
score_breakdown.school_information: 67 - School name and city provided but missing street address and zip code
score_breakdown.supporting_documents: 50 - Missing medical certificate and flight logbook; only 2 recommendation letters instead of 3

missing_items: Complete school address (street address and zip code)
